app-footer-like: ¡Gracias por elegir la aplicación Scrumpy \ u2122 Planning Poker! No olvides correr la voz si te gusta.
game-story-jira: Comience escribiendo Jira story ID o JQL
game-story-github: Comience escribiendo la consulta de búsqueda de GitHub
game-story-gitlab: Comience escribiendo la consulta de búsqueda de GitLab
game-story-moderator: Esperando que el moderador cree una historia
game-story-chat-label: Enviar un mensaje a todos los participantes
game-story-chat-hint: Presiona Ctrl + Enter o Alt + Enter para enviar
game-story-no-stories: Parece que aún no has agregado ninguna historia. Agrégalas desde el cuadro de búsqueda de arriba
game-story-example-jira-1: Recupera todas las historias de Sprint 6 que aún no están estimadas
game-story-example-jira-2: Recupera todos los problemas épicos del proyecto DEMO
game-story-example-github-1: Recupera todos los problemas que contienen 123 y son del repositorio myuser / myrepo
game-story-example-github-2: Recupera todos los errores abiertos relacionados con myuser
game-story-example-gitlab-2: Recupera errores en los métodos find_by_ <name> y no contienen 'notabug'
game-upload-description: Arrastra y suelta o haz clic para seleccionar archivos CSV
game-upload-example: Crea una historia y descarga el contenido del archivo CSV para obtener un archivo de ejemplo o usa el siguiente ejemplo
game-share-title: Planificación de la sala de póquer
game-share-description: Una sala de votación donde cualquiera puede unirse
game-selector-room-title: Selecciona una sala por nombre o enlace
game-selector-room-description: Ingrese el nombre de la sala de 12 letras (por ejemplo, ptleaevdmstx) o un enlace a la sala de Planning Poker (por ejemplo, https://beta.scrumpypoker.com/room/ptleaevdmstx)
game-selector-room-label: Nombre o enlace de la sala
game-selector-room-hint: Debe ser el nombre de una sala o un enlace
game-invite-room-title: Envíe una invitación por correo electrónico a los participantes
game-invite-room-description: Utilice el cuadro de entrada a continuación para enumerar las direcciones de correo electrónico a las que enviar la invitación para unirse a la sesión de planificación
game-invite-room-email-invalid: La lista contiene un correo electrónico no válido
game-invite-room-email-sent: Se ha enviado la invitación para unirse
game-security-pin-description: Esta sala está protegida con contraseña
game-settings-style-preset-description: Los ajustes preestablecidos permiten guardar y restaurar la configuración de las tarjetas. El ajuste preestablecido contiene las tarjetas inactivas y el mapeo de los puntos de la historia. Puede usar el ajuste preestablecido para asignar diferentes tarjetas de votación por cada historia planificada en la lista de historias planificadas. Si edita el mapeo y las tarjetas inactivas mientras un preset está activo, solo se modificará este preset.
game-settings-style-preset-add: No hay ajustes preestablecidos que coincidan con {patrón} . Presione enter para crear uno nuevo
game-settings-style-preset-error: Cada preset debe comenzar con una letra única
game-settings-theme-description: Establece un tema claro u oscuro según tus preferencias
game-settings-name-description: Ingresa tu nombre tal como aparecerías ante los otros jugadores
game-settings-vote-room-description: El nombre de esta sala, ya que será visible para otros participantes
game-settings-video-link-description: Por favor, especifique un video o un vínculo para compartir pantalla que los participantes puedan usar
game-settings-changes-allowed-descriptio: Comprueba si algún participante puede cambiar la configuración del juego fuera del tiempo de votación
game-settings-moderator-disallowed-title: No se permite el cambio de moderador
game-settings-moderator-disallowed-descr: No permitir ningún cambio de moderador durante la sesión de refinamiento / planificación. Si se marca, la moderación se puede establecer solo una vez y solo si no hay un moderador asignado todavía.
game-settings-security-pin-description: Esta es la contraseña de protección opcional para toda la sala. Solo las personas que la conocen pueden unirse
game-settings-security-pin-unset-descrip: Ahora hay un PIN de seguridad configurado para esta sala, puede desarmarlo desde aquí
game-settings-vote-time-description: El tiempo necesario para votar en segundos, después de este tiempo, la votación será por defecto (?)
game-settings-vote-complete-on-full-vote: Complete la votación inmediatamente después de que todos hayan votado sin esperar a que transcurra el tiempo de espera o tener que presionar el botón de avance
game-settings-vote-no-sounds-description: Habilita la producción de campanillas de sonido al inicio y finalización de la sesión de votación
game-settings-style-colors-description: Menos detalles de color en las tarjetas pueden ayudarlo a concentrarse en las historias que se están refinando
game-settings-vote-color-title: Imágenes de tarjetas a todo color
game-settings-vote-grayscale-title: Imágenes de tarjetas en escala de grises
game-settings-vote-guest-description: Ingrese a la sala de votación como invitado en modo de solo lectura
game-settings-vote-pre-vote-description: Permita que los participantes voten por adelantado, antes de que comience la sesión de planificación en caso de que no puedan participar a la hora señalada por algún motivo
game-settings-vote-end-description: La hora en que terminará la sesión de refinamiento, mostrará el progreso con el tiempo restante
game-settings-vote-end-label: Advertencia sobre la finalización del perfeccionamiento
game-settings-vote-end-hint: La hora de finalización de la sesión debe ser en el futuro
game-settings-planning-bottom-descriptio: Agrega siempre las nuevas historias al final de la lista con las historias planificadas
game-settings-style-open-vote-descriptio: Muestra siempre los votos de cada participante en el panel derecho para que cada voto pueda ser discutido inmediatamente
game-settings-style-estimado-field-descr: Un campo de estimación personalizado para los puntos de la historia en Jira en caso de que no sea una configuración estándar (por ejemplo, un campo numérico arbitrario utilizado para la estimación). De forma predeterminada, los 'Puntos de la historia' se prueba primero, luego 'Estimación puntual de la historia' y finalmente el campo personalizado definido aquí.
game-settings-style-additional-cards-des: Agregue tarjetas adicionales a la lista de tarjetas existentes para aumentar la granularidad de la votación. A veces es útil tener más opciones que las provistas con las tarjetas predeterminadas.
game-settings-style-additional-cards-map: La asignación de las tarjetas adicionales en forma de número de tarjeta a los puntos de la historia
game-settings-style-backgrounds-descript: El fondo de las tarjetas monocromáticas más simples se puede personalizar
game-settings-connection-test-descriptio: Compruebe si la conexión está configurada correctamente
game-settings-connection-jira: Se ha configurado una conexión con Atlassian Jira, puedes desconectarte desde aquí
game-settings-connection-slack: Se ha configurado una conexión a Slack, puedes desconectarte desde aquí
game-settings-connection-webhook: Se ha configurado una conexión a un web-hook de API externo, puedes desconectarte desde aquí
game-settings-jira-help: For detailed information on setting up Jira and Slack integrations, please refer to the documentation in the
game-settings-jira-url-description: Your Jira system domain (without https:// in front), both Jira Cloud and Jira Server are supported
game-settings-jira-url-http: Check this box in case your Jira server is not secure and works on the plain HTTP protocol instead of HTTPS.
game-settings-jira-user-name-description: Your user name which is used to log into Jira
game-settings-jira-token-description: Your Jira API token generated from the Atlassian Account Manager in case you use Jira Cloud or your plain text password in case you use Jira Server. It is intentionally hidden for security reasons.
game-settings-jira-token-help: You can get a Jira API token from
game-settings-add-comment-description: Add a summary comment with the chosen and average estimate in the ticket together with a link to the planning poker room
game-settings-github-token-description: Your GitHub API token generated from the settings page. It is intentionally hidden for security reasons.
game-settings-github-token-help: You can get a GitHub API token from
game-settings-gitlab-token-description: Your GitLab API token generated from the settings page. It is intentionally hidden for security reasons.
game-settings-gitlab-token-help: You can get a GitLab API token from
game-settings-slack-url-description: The web-hook URL to which Scrumpy Poker will publish notifications for Slack. It is intentionally hidden for security reasons.
game-settings-slack-url-help: Read more about Slack incoming web hooks on
game-settings-api-key-description: Please prove that you're not a robot to get the API key
game-settings-api-help: You can use the API console to test and debug on
game-settings-webhook-description: The URL on which REST notification will be sent
game-settings-plugins-description: Scrumpy Planning Poker is also available as an add-on to Jira. You can navigate to the Atlassian Marketplace and install them on your Jira platforms. You can read more about installing the add-ons at the
game-settings-plugin-jira-description: You can install Scrumpy as a Jira add-on from the settings panel in your Jira instance by searching for Scrumpy Planning Poker or directly from the
game-settings-confluence-location-descri: A summary page that is generated after the end of the refinement session as a child page of the specified page
game-settings-gitlab-project-description: Free-text search among accessible GitLab project. This project will be assigned to this room and only its issues will be estimated.
game-room-description: Please fill in the short form below to continue
game-room-signin-social: Or sign-in with a social network
game-room-step-robot-title: Prove that you're not a robot
game-room-step-robot-description: Just click on the box below to let us know that you're a human
game-room-step-play-description: That's it! Press the button below to start the voting session.
game-text-editor-hint: You can edit the summary and description of the user story by simply clicking on them. To change the formatting, select the text to format and a toolbar will appear. If you want to persist your changes, please press the save button!
game-text-editor-hint-no-story: Please select a planned story and edit the summary text and description if needed
game-labels-hint: Type a new label and press Enter to save
game-message-error: Something went wrong, please try again later
game-message-voting-full: Press fast_forward to complete
game-message-voting-unknown-description: When you have no clue what this is about
game-message-voting-brownie-description: When it is about time to have a snack
game-message-voting-yak-description: When you need to shave a whole yak to complete the task
game-message-voting-coffee-description: When you need a rest, get coffee, play tennis
game-message-plugin-copied: Link to plugin has been copied
game-message-preset-invalid: Each preset must start with a unique letter
game-voters-certainty-count: The participant has voted {times} times differently
game-voters-no-participants: It seems you're the only one active participant in the room. You can invite more participants from the buttons below or just copy the browser URL and send it to the rest.
game-voters-jira-no-participants: Note: The other Jira participants must also click on the poker link to appear in this room.
game-story-collaboration-committed: Ticket changes have been successfully committed
game-tooltip-game-complete: Save in history and switch to next story
game-tooltip-game-voting-notification: Send reminder to all participants that it is time to vote
game-tooltip-moderator-request: Become a moderator of the room
game-tooltip-qr: Shoot this QR code to join with mobile device
game-tooltip-refinement-feature-requests: List of feature requests that are under consideration
game-tooltip-refinement-documentation-de: Full documentation for Scrumpy Planning Poker
game-tooltip-no-storypoints: Won't update story points, please check the Jira Edit screens
game-summary-stories-description: After the session is over, the voting summary is stored here. Each planning session wraps a set of refined stories.
game-warning-clear-stories-text: You'll lose the list of stories that are scheduled for refinement, are you sure?
game-warning-clear-messages-text: You'll lose the the current chat history, are you sure?
game-warning-save-story-text: The story has been modified, would you like to save your changes?
game-warning-clear-refinement-text: You'll lose the list of refined stories from this refinement session, are you sure?
game-moderator-message: You are not a moderator, but you can request moderatorship at any time.
game-voting-freescale-description: You're allowed to vote with any value by using the slider below. When you're ready, please press the Vote Now button!
game-voting-freescale-slider-hint: Slide and then press the vote button
game-help: The cards are numbered as they are to account for the fact that the longer an estimate is, the more uncertainty it contains. Thus, if a developer wants to play a 6 he/she is forced to reconsider and either work through that some of the perceived uncertainty does not exist and play a 5, or accept a conservative estimate accounting for the uncertainty and play an 8.
game-help-more: You can learn more about Planning Poker on
game-help-pwa: This application is a PWA available for smartphone, tablet, laptop and desktop_windows. Just open this room with a mobile browser and optionally select the Add To Desktop to have the application permanently installed.
game-help-learn-pwa: Learn more about Progressive Web Applications on
game-rating-description: Please help us improve by sending a short feedback
game-rating-title: Help us make Scrumpy Planning Poker better!
game-satisfaction-title: How do you feel about the application?
game-satisfaction-description: Please let us know how we could improve the application and we'll do our best to implement it! We can also immediately reply to your questions if you send us e-mail or contact us on social media/messaging.
game-satisfaction-hint: Please write a sentence or two
game-welcome-introduction-description: Thank you for choosing Scrumpy Planning Poker for a remote estimation tool for your refinement/planning session! This short guide below will help you get started quickly.
game-welcome-step-1-description: In the edit box on the top of the page resides the story title or Jira issue number if the Jira integration is activated from the settings. The voting cannot start without a story, so please fill that field in first. If you're not a moderator, please wait until the room moderator starts the voting session. You'll see the issue details on the top of the screen.
game-welcome-step-2-description: To start with the voting session, press the play_arrow button in the bottom right corner of the screen. When the session is started, the team has a certain time to complete the voting. The voting session duration can be adjusted from the settings screen. If someone from the team votes directly by clicking on a card, the session is started in paused mode and the team has as much time as needed to vote. Additionally, if a team member has questions, the game can be stopped at any time by anyone by pressing the pause button. After the discussion is complete, the game can be resumed by pressing the play_arrow button again or ended by pressing the fast_forward button.
game-welcome-step-3-description: When the voting session is complete and the participants gave their vote, a statistics screen is shown. The actual result can be overridden if needed after a discussion within the team and finally the vote can be accepted. The accepted votes are grouped in a refinement session (the period between the first participant enters until the last participant leaves the room). The refinement sessions are listed on the left pane. When the Jira integration is enabled, after the vote is accepted the story points of the ticket are automatically updated, a comment is added.
game-welcome-step-4-description: The application provides various options that can be customised from the Settings page by navigating using the more_vert button. The participant name, room name, Regular/Fibonacci/T-Shirt sequence, voting time, preferred visual theme can be adjusted from the main settings tab. Additionally, integrations with Jira and Slack are available from the integrations tab. The application is also available as Atlassian Jira plugin.
game-welcome-step-5-description: You can invite people by simply sending the browser link, or copying it using the share button, or shooting the QR code when using mobile phone.
game-welcome-step-6-title: The special cards bring more joy
game-welcome-step-6-description: If you need to get noticed and provoke a good discussion on a story, why not vote with a special card? It will make the rest of the team wonder why is this strange vote appearing and ask what is wrong with the story, which is a good moment to explain. Additionally, the cards can indicate the need for a coffee break or other activities during the refinement. Anyway, please also feel free to assign a new meaning that you find relevant for each special card!
game-welcome-step-7-description: Thanks for reading the short introduction to the Scrumpy Planning Poker application, enjoy your planning session!
game-config-global-description: Scrumpy Planning Poker can be enabled or disabled on per-project level both for the root (dashboard) poker link as well as the per-board level. By default, all planning poker links are enabled for all projects. To enable fine-grained configuration, go to the Jira Global Permissions and disable the Allow Planning Poker permission. This will remove all Planning Poker links from the dashboard page and all boards.
game-config-dashboard-description: Once the Planning Poker is disabled globally, it can be then enabled for the dashboard by navigating to the Jira Global Permissions and enabling the Allow Planning Poker in dashboard setting.
game-config-project-boards-description1: Once the Planning Poker is disabled globally, it can be then enabled for the project boards by navigating to the Jira Project
game-config-project-boards-description2: permissions page and enabling the Allow Planning Poker permission for this project.
game-config-coming-soon: Coming soon. Please up-vote this feature at the Feature Requests page so that we implement this with a higher priority.
